title: Pulse Width Modulation Control
description:
PWM_PW is a pulse width modulated frequency generator. The generator
generates a fxed frequency F with a duty cycle (TON / TOFF) which can
bemodulated (set) by the input PW. The input passes the time before the
signal remains TRUE.
name: PWM_PW

input.name: F
input.description: The frequency of the PWM signal in Hertz.

input.name: PW
input.description: The duration of the pulse width.

output.name: Q
output.description: The output Boolean signal representing the PWM signal.
